msg.msgText:
A "Queue" composite object can be deleted using the "delete" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver delete Queue help imaserver delete Queue "Name=value" imaserver delete Queue "Name=value" "DiscardMessages=True"
EXAMPLE: imaserver delete Queue "Name=Queue1" imaserver delete Queue "Name=Queue1" "DiscardMessages=True"

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
